column2: Individual commitment to a group effort -- that is what makes a team work, a company work, a society work, a civilization work.
Talent wins games, but teamwork and intelligence wins championships.
The strength of the team is each individual member. The strength of each member is the team.
If everyone is moving forward together, then success takes care of itself.
Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
The best teamwork comes from men who are working independently toward one goal in unison.
Great things in business are never done by one person. They're done by a team of people.
Collaboration allows teams to innovate and solve complex problems.

Teamwork is the ability to work together toward a common vision. The ability to direct individual accomplishments toward organizational objectives. It is the fuel that allows common people to attain uncommon results.
The way a team plays as a whole determines its success. You may have the greatest bunch of individual stars in the world, but if they don't play together, the club won't be worth a dime.
The secret to getting ahead is getting started.
If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go together.
To me, teamwork is the beauty of our sport, where you have five acting as one. You become selfless.
The key to success is to focus our conscious mind on things we desire not things we fear.
We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
Success is not the absence of failure; it's the persistence through failure.
Success is not just about what you accomplish in your life; it's about what you inspire others to do.
Successful people do what unsuccessful people are not willing to do. Don't wish it were easier; wish you were better.
Successful people are not gifted; they just work hard, then succeed on purpose.
The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
The best way to predict the future is to create it.
The only thing standing between you and your goal is the bullshit story you keep telling yourself as to why you can't achieve it.
The best teamwork comes from men who are working independently toward one goal in unison.
Individual commitment to a group effort - that is what makes a team work, a company work, a society work, a civilization work.

Teamwork is the ability to work together toward a common vision. The ability to direct individual accomplishments toward organizational objectives. It is the fuel that allows common people to attain uncommon results.
Talent wins games, but teamwork and intelligence wins championships.
The strength of the team is each individual member. The strength of each member is the team.
It takes two flints to make a fire.
The way a team plays as a whole determines its success. You may have the greatest bunch of individual stars in the world, but if they don't play together, the club won't be worth a dime.
If everyone is moving forward together, then success takes care of itself.
The achievement of one goal should be the starting point of another.
The whole is greater than the sum of its parts.
Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
Collaboration allows teachers to capture each other's fund of collective intelligence.

In teamwork, silence isn't golden, it's deadly.
The best teamwork comes from men who are working independently toward one goal in unison.
The ratio of We's to I's is the best indicator of the development of a team.
The secret is to work less as individuals and more as a team. As a coach, I play not my eleven best, but my best eleven.
It takes two flints to make a fire.
The way a team plays as a whole determines its success. You may have the greatest bunch of individual stars in the world, but if they don't play together, the club won't be worth a dime.
If everyone is moving forward together, then success takes care of itself.
The whole is greater than the sum of its parts.
Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
The strength of the team is each individual member. The strength of each member is the team.
Great things in business are never done by one person. They're done by a team of people.
It's not about ideas. It's about making ideas happen.
Individually, we are one drop. Together, we are an ocean.
A successful team is a group of many hands and one mind.
The key to successful teamwork is to prioritize the well-being of the team over individual interests.
